content.name: HTML
contents: I understand the tags and their roles in HTML, and can read and understand the HTML Living Standard and HTML5 specifications.
I can create meaningful markup by using appropriate tags, and can pay attention to a structure that is easy to understand for search engines and screen readers.
I can use `aria-*` attributes appropriately to build an accessible website.
I understand the relationship between JavaScript and HTML (event propagation, DOM tree, Shadow DOM, etc.). I can use Web Components (custom elements, Shadow DOM).
I understand the impact of HTML structure on SEO.
I keep up with the latest trends in new technologies like HTML Modules and Declarative Shadow DOM.

content.name: CSS
contents: I understand the basic properties of CSS (selectors, box model, layout, color, font, text, animation, transition, etc.).
I understand CSS design techniques (BEM, OOCSS, SMACSS, Atomic Design, etc.).
I can design CSS with performance in mind (layout shift, hardware acceleration, etc.).
I can judge whether I can apply the latest CSS specifications to practice.
I can choose appropriate technologies without depending on specific CSS frameworks.

content.name: JavaScript
contents: I have a deep understanding of the language specification of JavaScript, and can use ES6 and later features.
I understand design patterns like modules, factories, singletons, and observers.
I understand module systems like ESM, CommonJS, UMD, etc.

I understand the web API and browser mechanisms (DOM, BOM, Event Loop, asynchronous processing, cross-origin communication, CORS, Cookie, Local Storage, Session Storage, IndexedDB, Service Worker, etc.).
I understand JavaScript performance improvements and security measures.
I keep up with the latest trends in JavaScript (ESNext, TC39 proposals, Babel, TypeScript, Flow, WebAssembly, etc.).

content.name: Vue.js
contents: I can use the Composition, Setup API of Vue3, and can lead the migration from Vue2.
I can use state management libraries like Pinia, Vuex, composables.
I can build advanced routing for SPAs using Vue router.
I understand how to optimize rendering and performance using v-once, v-memo, v-bind='object', virtual-scrolling, and keep-alive.
I understand design patterns like Container/Presentational and Atomic Design.

content.name: React
contents: I understand the mechanism of fast rendering with Virtual DOM.
I can use React Hooks, and can lead the migration from Class Component to Function Component.
I can use state management libraries like Redux, jotai, Zustand, Context API.
I can optimize API communication using data fetching libraries like React Query, SWR.
I can build advanced routing for SPAs using React Router.
I understand design patterns like Container/Presentational and Atomic Design.
I understand how to improve performance and security in React.

content.name: Next.js
contents: I understand the difference between App router and Pages router, and can design appropriate routing.
I understand rendering methods like SSR, SSG, CSR, RSC, and can choose appropriate methods.
I understand performance optimization techniques like image optimization, code splitting, pre-rendering, and caching strategies.
I can use data fetching methods like getStaticProps, getServerSideProps, getStaticPaths.
I can use API Routes and Edge Functions.
